alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 27 at 8:33AM CDT until July 28 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Cuivre River near Troy. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cuivre River near Troy. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Moderate flooding begins...significant agricultural land is inundated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 26.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 AM CDT Wednesday was 27.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this afternoon and continue falling to 5.8 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Thu Fri Sat Sun Mon Cuivre River Troy 21.0 26.2 8.5 6.3 6.0 6.0 5.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
